text: (O ona verit permission ziadost tvoj servants dieta nie attained puberty zapisat tvoj izba)! This bol je robi v 3 instances -Dawn Prayer noon when ona zmenit tvoj clothes zvysok Night Prayer. These je 3 private lehota ona. Do inaksie cas nie bol zlo ona them mingle 1 iny GOD thus clarifies revelations ONA. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
